unnormalised: Electoral reforms are vital for strengthening Indian democracy. Consider simultaneous elections - would that improve governance and reduce expenditure? The Election Commission of India has proposed various changes, but consensus is crucial. Perhaps a national dialogue, even during Onam celebrations, could foster understanding. Think of TN Seshan's legacy; further reforms are needed to reduce corruption and ensure fair play in our elections.
